channel.title: [tut] My very own webclient tut for 639 and 317 clients![/tut] UPDATED
channel.description:
ok, ill just make a lil tut/snippet :p download [url=http://download.cnet.com/JAR-Maker/3000-2213_4-10588876.html]JarMaker.[/url] Download [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-7u3-download-1501626.html]Java JDK.[/url] do this: 1. Install java jdk 2. Right click the run.bat , and edit. 3. Find the main class (is in the run.bat), 317: client.class , 639: RunClient.class 4. Open JarMaker. 5. Follow [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oyMnwemtrCM&feature=plcp]this[/url] on how to jar and sign a client, change your main class to the main class that u just found! 6. double click ur .jar to run it (7. when u want a webclient, upload it(dropbox is really easy)) ---- How to make a webclient ---- 1. U need a webhost where you can add HTML codes to! 2. For 317 upload this to your site: but first fill in the needed information!! [code]

SERVER NAME HERE

 

[/code] 3.For 639 add this to site: [u]fill in[/u] the needed information [code]

Server name here!!!

 

[/code] 4. Save and ur done!! Pleased to help ppl out ##first tut/snippet## Don't hate :p

item.title: [tut] My very own webclient tut for 639 and 317 clients![/tut] UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @xLinear xLinear
item.description:
@xLinear wrote:

can someone please help, when i find what to do for a 637/9 it doesnt work :facepalm:
i have:
1.edited the RunClient.class to have my IP adress in ( i know it uses the one in run.bat)
2.JARed the file (all the contents in the client)

9Ulpi.png1920×1080

3.in the manifest i have set it to RunClient

4.Signed the jar and uploaded to dropbox
5. inserted the 639 HTML to my webpage, changed all the required information, saved and published
6. gone to my page with the webclient on only to get an error
okl97.png1920×1080

and that error is:

load: class RunClient.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: RunClient.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: RunClient.class

Please tell me on how to fix this <3

Read full topic

item.title: [tut] My very own webclient tut for 639 and 317 clients![/tut] UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

ok, ill just make a lil tut/snippet

download JarMaker.
Download Java JDK.
do this:

  1. Install java jdk
  2. Right click the run.bat , and edit.
  3. Find the main class (is in the run.bat), 317: client.class , 639: RunClient.class
  4. Open JarMaker.
  5. Follow this on how to jar and sign a client, change your main class to the main class that u just found!
  6. double click ur .jar to run it
    (7. when u want a webclient, upload it(dropbox is really easy))

---- How to make a webclient ----

  1. U need a webhost where you can add HTML codes to!
  2. For 317 upload this to your site: but first fill in the needed information!!

[code]

SERVER NAME HERE

 

[/code]

3.For 639 add this to site: fill in the needed information

[code]

Server name here!!!

 

[/code]
  1. Save and ur done!!

Pleased to help ppl out ##first tut/snippet##

Don’t hate

Read full topic
